author: rse
msg: More statics which reduce the global exported symbol table.

author: rse
msg: Now we support building modules as shared objects on all major platforms.

author: rse
msg: And another nice platform where we support shared objects: OSF1
(BTW: compares to the linker nightmare I had under AIX today the
OSF1 platform is really a pleasure)

author: rse
msg: Shrink list of global symbols by making more stuff static
which currently is global without need.

author: rse
msg: Make sure definitions are not in the middle of the target section (which
confuses some Make variants) and slightly sort the objects file list for
